# PlainDoctor — Healthcare Provider Directory

> PlainDoctor provides free access to healthcare provider data from the CMS National Plan and Provider Enumeration System (NPPES). This is a directory of publicly available provider information — PlainDoctor does not rate, rank, or recommend providers.

## Data Coverage
- 2M+ active healthcare providers across the United States
- Provider details: name, credentials, specialty, practice address, phone
- 500+ medical specialties
- Searchable by name, specialty, location, or NPI number

## Data Source
Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS), National Plan and Provider Enumeration System (NPPES)
https://download.cms.gov/nppes/NPI_Files.html

## Pages
- Homepage: https://plaindoctor.com/
- Provider profiles: https://plaindoctor.com/provider/{slug}
- Specialty directory: https://plaindoctor.com/specialty
- Specialty pages: https://plaindoctor.com/specialty/{slug}
- State directory: https://plaindoctor.com/state
- State pages: https://plaindoctor.com/state/{slug}
- Search: https://plaindoctor.com/search
